title: ET India Rising: Kinetic Green’s Sulajja Firodia Motwani on steering the India EV adoption story
description: What will power the India EV adoption story and bolster the backbone of India’s transport sector—the electric two-wheeler and three-wheeler segment? Diving into the government’s FAME factor driving demand, the thrust on ‘green growth’, the terrain of battery-swapping, and the revolutionary paradigm of women on the shop floor, was Sulajja Firodia Motwani, founder and CEO of Kinetic Green Energy and Power Solutions, as she shared the green-print of India’s EV revolution at ET India Rising.
